prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon with dark wings and a fierce expression.
I want a mythical creature that embodies destruction and has vibrant red colors.
Generate an imposing Pokemon that dominates the sky with its powerful wings.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a giant dark bird with sharp claws and intense eyes.
Imagine a creature that thrives in mountainous regions and has a striking contrast of colors.
Design a dark-type Pokemon that is both fearsome and majestic in appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the concept of death and rebirth with its vivid features.

distinctive_features: Large wings resembling a bird of prey
